title: Pixel 3 low ringtone Volume..Has this ever been solved?
content:
My Pixel 3a has very low ringtone/alert/alarm volume. You can barely hear incoming calls and alarms etc

It is not the speakers as when you play the sound  from settings, it is plenty  loud as is media.

In call voice volume is fine.

All volume sliders are to max

Works the same in safe mode

Has not always been like this

There seems to be a lot of folks on here and elsewhere on the net that seem to have a similar issue. Have not found a definitive solution, is there one.
